resources.string:
The Women's protection app is safety app that helps the victim to notify her nearby friends and family that she is in trouble. The situation when the victim feels that she is unsafe she can send alert message to pre selected contacts. 
 
 	 	 	 Women's protection app allows the victim to trace and share her location with her contacts as well as on social media. Police station tracker traces the nearest police station. Using camera feature the victim can share the land mark pictures on social media. 
 
 	 	 	 The concept is given by Mr.Venkatesh shetty
